title: Frangle for Watchmaker
summary: Futuristic watch face design for Android Wear. Compatible LG G Watch R Moto 360
description: ***This watchface requires the latest Watchmaker  http://goo.gl/FMxUfY to make sure you can see all of the newest features.***Main Screen Options⌚ On the Right - Switch between 12 fonts⌚ On the Left - Switch between 7 colors⌚ Tap the Weather Icon - 3 Day Forecast⌚ Options Gear - Open the OptionsOptions Include:⌚ Switch between 7 colors⌚ Change the Background"I dont just make watch faces, I make faces with options for YOU."Compatible with Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, and any other Android Wear round face watches..More features to be added soon....
descriptionHTML:
***This watchface requires the latest Watchmaker http://goo.gl/FMxUfY to make sure you can see all of the newest features.***

Main Screen Options
⌚ On the Right - Switch between 12 fonts
⌚ On the Left - Switch between 7 colors
⌚ Tap the Weather Icon - 3 Day Forecast
⌚ Options Gear - Open the Options
Options Include:
⌚ Switch between 7 colors
⌚ Change the Background

"I dont just make watch faces, I make faces with options for YOU."

Compatible with Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, and any other Android Wear round face watches..

More features to be added soon....
comments: Had to refund. We need the option to change ambient. Can't hide a beautiful face behind a blank screen. fix that and I'll pay twice the price. Or leave it customizeable.
